summary: A newsman discovers he's been rigged with a bomb after he has an exclusive interview with a terrorist who blew up a bridge.
cast: Won-Jin Ahn|Duk-moon Choi|Lee Da-wit|Jung-woo Ha|Sung-chun Han|Han Soo Hyun|Hye-jin Jeon|Choi Jin-ho|Jin-ah Kang|Hae-in Kim|Hong-pa Kim|So-jin Kim|Kyeong-yeong Lee
title: Deu tae-ro ra-i-beu
